segments.text: Please show me the menu , Miss .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . Here you are . Can I take your order now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I'd like an Italian soup to start with and then some fried noodles .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Can I serve you anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I'd like another cup of coffee afterwards . Make it hot , please .
segments.speaker: S1
